results.title: Bullfight
results.brief_description: Anna Sokolow recreates and reacts to a remembered bullfight and through her dancing recaptures her feelings while watching the fight. The climax is reached when the dancer identifies with the bullfighter, the bull and the death in the ring.
results.description: Anna Sokolow recreates and reacts to a remembered bullfight and through her dancing recaptures her feelings while watching the fight. The climax is reached when the dancer identifies with the bullfighter, the bull and the death in the ring.

results.title: The Bulk Link
results.creator_credit: Scope Films and South Australian Film Corporation
results.brief_description: The ‘bulk-link’ is the vital bridge from the harvest field to the shipping port- the bulk grain handlers. New techniques in the field, the central storage facilities at the embarkation port have made the bulk link a more economical and efficient process. Photography: Edwin Scragg.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Scope Films and South Australian Film Corporation

results.title: Bulgaria: the land and the people
results.brief_description: Shows Bulgaria as a nation with a mixed heritage of Slavic, Greek, Turkish and Russian influences. There are still many reminders of these past civilisations. Under a communist government efforts have been made over the years to modernise industry and improve educational facilities and training.

results.title: Building trades
results.creator_credit: Career Productions and Mutual Film Corporation
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Is this your career series”.
A vocational guidance film showing the work of tradesmen in the construction of a house, an office block or a factory, including bricklayers, plasterers, tilers and carpenters. Discusses careers available to building tradesmen as supervisors or in their own building companies.

results.title: Building on research
results.brief_description: Sponsored research helps maintain quality and high production. Studies of soil mechanics led to new developments in footings allowing greater scope in planning buildings; a moisture meter led to new uses for hardwoods treated with preservatives; finger jointing prevents timber wastage; protected working spaces are provided by laminated trusses; control of firing procedures eliminates expansion of brickwork; strengthening of concrete and devices to cope with problems occurring with high buildings.
results.description: Sponsored research helps maintain quality and high production. Studies of soil mechanics led to new developments in footings allowing greater scope in planning buildings; a moisture meter led to new uses for hardwoods treated with preservatives; finger jointing prevents timber wastage; protected working spaces are provided by laminated trusses; control of firing procedures eliminates expansion of brickwork; strengthening of concrete and devices to cope with problems occurring with high buildings.
description_for_label: Sponsored research helps maintain quality and high production. results.title: Building houses
results.brief_description: A survey of the major operations involved in the construction of a modern house: preparation of plans by architects; stripping of site and laying of foundations; subsequent work of bricklayers, carpenters, tilers, plumbers, glaziers, electricians, plasterers, painters and others. The commentary points out that the finished house is the result of the combined efforts of a large team of craftsmen.

The commentary points out that the finished house is the result of the combined efforts of a large team of craftsmen.

results.title: Building an organisation
results.creator_credit: Bonnie Sherr Klein, Barrie Howells, John Kemeny and National Film Board of Canada
results.brief_description:
Episode of Series “Challenge for change/Societe nouvelle”.
In this film we witness obstacles encountered by a new community action organization in Buffalo, New York, as it begins to work for recognition. Award: Columbus
